definition: dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)

sentences.english: Conclusion "Zhishi Xiaopi Decoction" is effective to improve the gastrointestinal dysfunction in severe patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论枳实消痞方能改善危重病患者胃肠道障碍。

sentences.english: Objective To study the quality standard of different specifications of Frutus Aurantii Immaturus.
sentences.chinese: 目的对不同规格枳实药材进行系统的质量研究。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the chemical constituents of Fructus Aurantii Immaturus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究枳实中的多甲氧基黄酮类化合物。

definition: husk of betel nut 檳榔|槟榔[bing1 lang5]
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)

the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
